page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: In this place,in 1985,we have many places for entertainment,such as cinamas,theatres,a leisure centre, public houses,night clubs and bingo halls.Through our surveys we have found that the majority of the population only visit the the cinema, theartre,and concerts on special occasions.Also we found that dancing is a dying hobby with only 10% going regularly.Suprisingly bingo also\ 61% never go at all.38% of the population are in some sort of organisation or club those for the over 60 age group. Almost one third of people surveryed, admitted to going out at least once a week for a social event.One person in fifty appears never to go out to any social function.Popular hobbies are "pop" music/computor games.
